statements: DELETE FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE patch_id IN (SELECT patch_id FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_name = 'SQL Injection')
DELETE FROM patches WHERE patch_version = '1.0' AND patch_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High' AND description ILIKE '%critical%' AND id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM systems WHERE is_up_to_date = FALSE;
DELETE FROM system_patches WHERE system_id = 123 AND patch_id = 456;
DELETE FROM system_vulnerabilities WHERE system_id = 1 AND vulnerability_id = 5;
DELETE FROM patch_vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 3 AND patch_id = 2;
